articles.title: Recent BPLRT disruptions linked to newly installed power system, LTA investigating
articles.summary:
📰 제목: 육상교통청 관련 뉴스
🔍 주요 키워드: 교통(Transport), 육상교통청(LTA)
📝 교통(Transport), 육상교통청(LTA) 관련 소식
articles.content: SMRT has since linked both disruptions to a newly installed power system. The Land Transport Authority (LTA) is conducting a thorough investigation into the issue. Both cases are reportedly linked to the “newly installed Power SCADA system”
